# allowsMultipleSelection

**Instance Property**

Returns whether multiple items can be selected.

## Declaration

```swift
optional var allowsMultipleSelection: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If this properties is not implemented, the text finder will act as if they returned [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Selection Information

- **isSelectable**: Returns whether the text is selectable.
- **firstSelectedRange**: Returns the currently selected range.
- **selectedRanges**: Returns an array of selected ranges.

items.description: Returns whether the text is selectable.
